TEXT.TITLE: CBT T-NOTE OPTIONS SET VOLUME RECORD
TEXT.BODY: The Chicago Board of Trade, CBT, achieved record volume in trading of 10-year U.S. Treasury note futures-options April 10. Volume reached 38,402 contracts, up from the previous record of 16,349 contracts set April 9. Reuter
